title: The Zeit Lotus 7/26: 2020 Olympics, Tucker Carlson, Luka Doncic, The Green Knight, Parkland Shooting, Reefer Madness, Anna's Streaming Corner
itunes:title: The Zeit Lotus 7/26: 2020 Olympics, Tucker Carlson, Luka Doncic, The Green Knight, Parkland Shooting, Reefer Madness, Anna's Streaming Corner
description:
In this edition of The Zeit Lotus, Jack and Anna Hossnieh discuss the Olympics, Tucker Carlson being confronted in Montana fishing shop, Luka Doncic's 48 pt Olympic debut, yet another King Arthur movie, "the Green Knight", the Parkland shooting survivor whose parents think they are a crisis actor, Fox and Friends dredging up the demonstrably false 'Reefer Madness' narrative, and Anna's Streaming Corner!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
